text: Stretch your hands by putting out your arm in front of you with the inside of yout hand up. Then with the other hand grab the fingers and stretch them downwards. Keep this up for the set amount of time.
Put up your hand above your had
Do a plank for 20 seconds today!
Sit less, stand up for 1 minute every hour today!
Jog on the spot for 2 minutes today!
